meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dave Leach Jennifer Green Jason Keller Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6279.

div.div:
Jason Keller game 10.
Dave Leach game 1.

td.p: Dave Leach, a software analyst from Atlanta, Georgia
Jennifer Green, a university librarian from Paris, Tennessee
Jason Keller, a tutor from Highland Park, New Jersey (whose 9-day cash winnings total $213,900)

tr.td: I THINK I LOVE SHOE
KENTUCKY KERNELS
EPONYMS
OFFICIAL BRITISH ROYAL POSTS
CHILDREN'S LIT
THAT SMELLS... LIKE A CELEBRITY!

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Tassel-top, chain & penny are variations of this shoe')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Tassel-top, chain & penny are variations of this shoe

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'Born in Kentucky the year before Lincoln, he became president the same year as Lincoln & died 24 years after Lincoln')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Born in Kentucky the year before Lincoln, he became president the same year as Lincoln & died 24 years after Lincoln

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_3_1', 'clue_J_3_1_stuck', 'This -ism named for a legendary soldier devoted to Napoleon can mean the belief that one\'s gender is superior')

tr.td: This -ism named for a legendary soldier devoted to Napoleon can mean the belief that one's gender is superior

toggle('clue_J_2_2', 'clue_J_2_2_stuck', '(Jennifer: Who are the Hatfields?)
...

the McCoys

JenniferDave
')

Jennifer

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Jason
Jennifer
Dave
OPERA
SCIENTISTS
THE THIRD-MOST POPULAR PRESIDENTIAL CHOICE
(Alex: We'll give you the name of the candidate who finished in third place. You have to tell us who won that presidential election.)
"D-O"
DAYLIGHT COME
ME WANNA GO HOME

Jennifer

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Dave] You\'re going home with $15,599, and Jason Keller is going home with a lot of money, over $213,000. He\'s gonna be in our Tournament of Champions next time out.)
JasonWho is Grisham?
$7,000
JenniferWho is McMurty?
$11,198
DaveWho is Michener?
$3,401
Larry McMurtry')

tr.td: CONTEMPORARY AMERICAN WRITERS
Concluding a 4-book series, his 2004 novel "Folly and Glory" features Kit Carson, William Clark & Jim Bowie

Jennifer
Dave
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
New champion: $15,599

Dave
